CommandDefinition.Name: forcecleanabandonedorder
CommandDefinition.Description: Removes all evidence for the abandoned order.

Argument.Name: entryID
Argument.Description: The entryID of the abandoned order to be cleaned.

BoolOption.Name: a
BoolOption.Description: Cleans all abandoned orders except those abandoned intentionally.

BoolOption.Name: f
BoolOption.Description: Cleans abandoned order family except those abandoned intentionally.

BoolOption.Name: r
BoolOption.Description: Cleans abandoned order using clean up routines from all detection rules.
